solution_line_template: There are {first_group_members} + {second_group_members} members = <<{first_group_members}+{second_group_members}={members_first_two_groups}>>{members_first_two_groups} members in the first two groups.

This means the third group has {total_choir_members} total members - {members_first_two_groups} members in the first two groups = <<{total_choir_members}-{members_first_two_groups}={third_group_members}>>{third_group_members} members.
